ComicInfo.Summary:
In the fifth issue of the ongoing Bob’s Burgers Comic Book, the Belchers serve you a steaming plate of new stories! Louise tracks down a peculiar pest control problem; Gene dives deep down to the depths of the ocean as Captain Gene-o; we join Tina for the second installment of "Tinablanca"; Bob has a need for speed in his newest food truck idea; and Linda discovers that sea creatures love the camera, and the camera loves them.
ContentsTina's Erotic Friend Fiction Presents: Tinablanca, Part 2Bob's Fantast Food Truck Concept Art 'Formula Bun'Louise's Unsolved Mysteries and Curious Curiosities Presents: Pester-geist, Part 1Linda's Attempt To Take A Nice Family Picture In Front of the Restaurant (And How It Always Goes Wrong) #325Gene's Rhymey Rhymes That Could One Day Be Songs Presents: Captain Gene-o, Part 1*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- A/Reg | Cover A | Damon Wong | 1 | B/Reg | Cover B | Ashley Armstrong | 2 | C/LE | Rare "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Damon Wong | 3 |

ComicInfo.Writer: Ben Dickerson, Jeff Drake, Loren Bouchard, Rachel Hastings
ComicInfo.Penciller: Anthony Aguinaldo, Denise Berry, Frank Forte, Hector Reynoso, Kat Kosmala, Kimball Shirley, Rob Cureton, Tom Connor
ComicInfo.Inker: Anthony Aguinaldo, Denise Berry, Frank Forte, Hector Reynoso, Kat Kosmala, Kimball Shirley, Rob Cureton, Tom Connor
ComicInfo.Characters: Bob Belcher, Gene Belcher, Linda Belcher, Louise Belcher, Tina Belcher
